thread.title: Katie Price trusts husband completely

author: NewsWire
title: Katie Price trusts husband completely
text: Added on October 4, 2015 NewsWire despite , Katie Price Katie Price trusts husband completely London, Oct 5 (IANS) Singer Katie Price says she trusts her husband Kieran Hayler completely despite the fact that he cheated on her in the past. She believes that in past two years, he has changed from a boy to a man. The former model’s marriage to the 28-year-old was shaky when the latter admitted to cheating on Price with two of her best friends, but the 37-year-old insists he has “changed”, reports femalefirst.co.uk. “Other people think Kieran is a cheat and a liar, but I don’t care what they think. I’m the harshest judge and I know how much he has changed. In the past two years, he’s gone from a boy to a man. I trust him 100 percent,” Fabulous magazine quoted Price as saying. Sharing that her husband’s life now revolves only around her children and herself, Price said: “He’s not vain, he hardly looks at himself in the mirror. He’s even got a little pot belly, which I actually like a lot. His whole life revolves around me and the kids. We never row, we have a laugh, and he’s the one man who makes me totally happy.” Related Posts
